mapper.insert:
insert into items_comments( id, user_id, item_id, item_name, item_spec_id, sepc_name, comment_level, content, created_time, updated_time ) values
( #{item.commentId}, #{userId}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemSpecId}, #{item.itemSpecName}, #{item.commentLevel}, #{item.content}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ic.id as commentId, ic.content as content, ic.CREATED_TIME as createdTime, ic.item_name as itemName, ic.item_id as itemId, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ii.url as itemImg FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON ic.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{paramsMap.userId} AND ii.is_main= 1 ORDER by ic.created_time desc
